content: this is a simple and easy but fun to knit cowl knit in drops air a fluffy soft blown worsted/aran weight yarn the cowl is great for gift knits transitional months a quick in-between project and much more knit up as many as you d like it s a one skein project so you can use any yarn you d like you ll need at least 100 yards this cowl is great for beginners and advanced knitters alike __________________________________________________________________ *yarn * the yarn i used was drops air 164 yards worsted/aran weight in color purple haze feel free to use any worsted weight-bulky yarn you would like you will need about 100 yards or less/more depending on gauge and/or modifications *needles * size 7 us 16 inch circular knitting needles use needles that will fit your yarn choice since gauge doesn t matter much for this project *gauge * gauge doesn t matter too much but will affect how much yarn you use and the finished size of your cowl 17 sts and 28 rounds over 4 inches in knit 1 purl 1 rib in the round *finished size * unblocked approximately 9 5 wide and 5 tall with the edges rolled if gauge is met thank you for looking
